title: Ellie and the Mushroom Thief
description: In the Blue forest, in her little wooden caravan, lives a witch named Ellie Little. She is a special kind of witch who likes to cast spells and brew potions but most of all she loves to cook. As she is about to cook her favorite magical muffins the mushrooms are stolen! Now it is up to the little witch to capture the thief and find out if dragons are real!
author: Kate Amedeo
